subtask1.ensemble: Yes, multiple model outputs were combined for the turn detection
subtask1.desc: Translate spoken conversations into text-like ones.

subtask2.ensemble: Yes, multiple model outputs were combined for the knowledge selection
subtask2.desc: Sentence encoding by bert. knowledge selection by graph-based model

subtask3.ensemble: No, only a single model was used for the response generation
subtask3.desc: Generation by roberta-based model with auxiliary latent variable, knowledge copy and first-word-fixed beam search
